html: 9.2.17  11:48 pm   Hi Bill, so I just finished creating an edit of "modern woes" that cuts out the references to the "penis statue" and "lesbians" so it can be safe for schools...just kidding! :) I just wanted to say thanks for the inspiration and entertainment you've given me, and to ask what I can do to help you continue to create. I'm already subscribed to your Patreon, but I'd really like to make your life easier (or rather, I'd like to help let you live the life and make the art you most want to). What would you like your fans to do that we don't do enough?
